i18n.error1: Sorry, there was a browser error in starting the schematic tool. We recommend using the latest versions of Firefox and Chrome.
i18n.Link_tip: Link: share a link to the circuit
i18n.Cut: Cut selected components to the clipboard
i18n.Copy: Copy selected components to the clipboard
i18n.source_for_ac: Name of V or I source for ac
i18n.AC_Analysis_add_a_voltage_probe: AC Analysis: add a voltage probe to the diagram!
i18n.Zero_ac_response: Zero ac response, -infinity on dB scale.
i18n.ckt_alert1: Warning! Circuit has a voltage source loop or a source or current probe shorted by a wire, please remove the source or the wire causing the short.
i18n.ckt_alert2: Warning! Simulator might produce meaningless results or no result with illegal circuits.
i18n.ckt_warning1: Warning! Two circuit elements share the same name
i18n.ckt_alert3: Please make at least one connection to ground (triangle symbol)
i18n.ckt_alert4: Newton Method failed, do your current sources have a conductive path to ground?
i18n.ckt_alert5: Newton Method failed, it may be your circuit or it may be our simulator.
i18n.ckt_alert6: DC failed, trying transient analysis from zero.
i18n.ckt_alert7: AC analysis refers to an unknown source,
i18n.ckt_error1: Rows of M mismatched to b or cols mismatch to x.
i18n.ckt_error2: Row or columns of A too large for B
i18n.ckt_error3: Row or columns of A too large for C
i18n.ckt_error4: scalea and scaleb must be scalars or Arrays
i18n.ckt_error5: Rows or cols > rows or cols of dest
i18n.ckt_error6: Rows or cols > cols or rows of dest
i18n.Transient_Analysis_add_a_probe: Transient Analysis: add a probe to the diagram!
i18n.which_is_not_an_actual_circuit_node: , which is not an actual circuit node.
i18n.Comma_separated_list: Comma-separated list of alternating times and values
i18n.name: Name
i18n.label: Label

strAddC: Add component: Tap on a part in the parts bin, then tap on the schematic.
strAddW: Add wire: Touch on a connection point (open circle). Drag. Release.
strSel:
Select: Drag a rectangle to select components. 
(desktop:) Shift-click to include another component.
strMove: Move: Touch and drag to a new location.
strDel: Delete: Tap to select, then tap the X icon or hit BACKSPACE.
strRot: Rotate/Reflect: Click to select, then click on the rotation icon or type the letter "r" to rotate 90. Repeat for more rotations and reflections (8 total).
strProp: Properties: Double tap on a component to change its properties.
strNum:
Numbers may be entered using engineering notation,
T = 10^12, G = 10^9, M = 10^6, k = 10^3
m = 10^-3, u = 10^-6, n = 10^-9, p = 10^-12, f = 10^-15
